resources.string: HiKam is a free App for HiKam Camera, the best-in-class IP camera for home and small business. HiKam adopts the advanced P2P technology to ensure you the most easy, excellent and reliable experience of vedio monitoring, wherever you are and whenever you want. HiKam helps you to take care your family and protect your fortune.

With \"Smart Scan\" and \"AirLink\" you can configure the camera and add it into camera list.\n\nWith \"Lan Scan\" and \"Manual\" you can add the camera into camera list. It works only when the camera is already connected to the internet, via WiFi or LAN-Cable. It is useful, when you want to add the camera on the second smartphone.
Name your camera, e.g. Living room

Initial Password can be found on the back side of the camera or on user manual.\n\nIn case you have already changed the initial password, e.g. this camera was already configured on another smartphone/tablet, please input the new password.
HiKam Camera is connected to your WiFi and added to the camera list successfully. Now you can:
1. With admin accout one can access the vedio monitoring and do all the setups. Guest accout can only view the vedio monitoring.
Please check the conditions mentioned at the beginning and try again.
If still cannot work, please contact us:\n\thttp://supportus.hi-kam.com\n\tEmail: service.us@hi-kam.com
We will help you within the next hours.

You are not connecting to a 2.4Ghz WiFi. Please switch to a 2.4Ghz WIFI.\n\nIf you are not sure about WIFI frequency, you can temporarily disable 5Ghz WiFi on your wireless router during camera setup. When camera setup is done, you can re-open the 5Ghz WiFi.
Alarm push ID is your APP user ID
Alarm ID must be no more than 9 character
Camera ID length must be no more than 9 character
Alarm receive accounts has reached the maximum.
Push alarm notification to your smartphone.

Alarm is enabled during the giving peroid.
Alarm is disabled outside the giving period.
In case no schedule is defined, the alarm follows Manual Activation/Deactivation.
Maximal 3 alarm schedule is allowed.
Have found the camera for you:
1. Set the camera to AP mode
2. Connect your Smartphone to the AP
Please update the HiKam app via Google Play to operate the camera.
Your friends will call you with it.
Please input WiFi Name and Password
Siren on the camera make alarm sound, to deter the intruder.
Motion Detection detects any movements in the sight filed of the camera. Movement may be caused by trees, human, cars, flowers, curtains, pets â€¦ etc.
Alarm Trigger 2: Motion Detection with Passive Infrared. With the help of built-in Passive Infrared Sensor, intrusion in short range is detected reliably.

The camera was added to your App successfully.

Now you can choose the WiFi to let the camera connect to.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
Please check the conditions mentioned at the beginning and try again.
If still cannot work, please contact us:\n\thttp://supportus.hi-kam.com\n\tEmail: service.us@hi-kam.com
We will help you within the next hours.

Please make sure the following condition is fulfilled, otherwise the installation may fail:
	1. The WiFi runs at 802.11 b/g/n, 2.4GHz.
	2. You have internet access through the WiFi.
	3. Your smartphone is connected to the same WiFi, to which you want the camera connect to.
	4. Your smartphone and the camera is near each other (e.g. 3feet/1meter).
	5. You know the WiFi correct password.
Please power on the camera. The camera will begin to beep slightly: Di-Di-Diâ€¦\nIf this is not the case, please reset the camera.
Please be patient,connection is complete soon
Camera ID length must be digital combination
Camera ID length must be no more than 9 character
%1$s is using the initial password, please set it to your own.
Camera password must be digital combination and can not be \"0\" at the beginning
The password must not begin with \'0\'
Device password length must be no more than 30 character
The camera password is empty,please create a new password

Please set up the time zone first.
For USA:
HST: UTC - 10; HDT: UTC - 9
AKST: UTC - 9; AKDT: UTC - 8
PST: UTC - 8; PDT: UTC - 7
MST: UTC -7; MDT: UTC - 6
CST: UTC - 6; CDT: UTC - 5
EST: UTC - 5; EDT: UTC -4

Camera has no clock battery to maintain the time, it loses its date and time when powered off.
Camera synchronizes its date and time using NTP server when internet access is available.
Are you sure to clear?If you do this,you will lose all the data!
Device ID not correct,pls have a check
The current version is the latest
No camera added.\n\nClick \"+\" on right up corner to add a camera.
Camera password false, please edit it here: My Camera -> Settings -> Camera Editor
(Device password can\'t be \"0\" at the beginning and Must be a number)
The current camera does not support Defence Area
Some email provider rejects our alarm email, in this case, you will not receive any emails. Please also check your SPAM and add alert@hikam.de into you contact list.
Email must be 5-31 characters in length
The picture size is too large!
2. If you forget your camera password, press the Reset at the bottom of the device with paper clip or something alike. It resets the device password to default: \"123\".
You need to register an account!
Get phone code too frequently, please try again later
AirLink helps you connect HiKam cameras to your WiFi router.\n\nAirLink is suitable only for new cameras (or for cameras after factory reset)

A. Your smartphone is connected to the WiFi, to which you want to connect the camera.

B. Your smartphone, the camera and the router are within a 9 ft./3 m radius (You can move the camera farther away if you like once AirLink is completed).

C. You know the WiFi password.

A. Power on the camera

B. Wait for about 30 seconds

C. The camera beeps softly: di-di-diâ€¦ and the blue LED flashes
Please make sure that the WiFi name below is the WiFi you want the camera to connect to (if not, please go back to step 1)
The camera will emit a â€˜dongâ€™ sound once it has received the configuration data from the smartphone.

The camera has been successfully added to your app.

Now you can choose the WiFi network the camera will connect to.

Continue to Stay at AP Mode

Under AP Mode, your phone can connect to camera directly, by WiFi emitted by camera. No WiFi router needed.

Under AP mode, the camera has no internet connection. So the camera CAN NOT be accessed remotely.

You can switch the camera to your WiFi later anytime. Just go to App --> Settings of the camera --> Network Settings

Now you can setup the camera to connect to your WiFi:
 Just tap on your WiFi from the list below, then WiFi password need to be input.

 The camera will reboot to connect to the specified WiFi automatically .The AP mode will be stopped too.

AP mode is an alternative to â€˜AirLinkâ€™, in case of missing confirmation sound (â€˜dongâ€¦â€™) with â€˜AirLinkâ€™.

In AP mode, the HiKam camera generates a WiFi signal named â€˜HiKam-â€¦.XXXâ€™

Once the smartphone is connected to the HiKam cameraâ€™s WiFi, you can use the HiKam app to configure the HiKam camera and help the camera connect to your WiFi router.

Turn the camera on and wait for 30 seconds. 

Press the â€˜resetâ€™ button on the back of the camera for 10 seconds with a paper clip, until you will have heard the second acoustic signal. Then wait for another 30 seconds. 

The camera is now in AP mode. The LED flashes alternately blue and red.
Please go to your smartphoneâ€™s setup menu and connect your smartphone to the WiFi generated by the HiKam camera.\n\nAfterwards, please return to this page and click onto â€˜Continueâ€™.
Your smartphone is NOT connected to the cameraâ€™s WiFi, please wait for 30 seconds and then return to step 2.\n

Your smartphone is now connected to the cameraâ€™s WiFi.

The app is searching for a HiKam camera, please wait a moment.
Please name your camera, e.g. living room
Please set a new camera password for your own protection. 6-30 characters (0-9, a-z, A-Z)
Please aim the camera to the Smart Scan Codeï¼ŒWait until you hear a Dong sound.
Will no longer receive alarm info within
Camera password correct. It is the initial password, please change it to yours
Please input the alarm push ID
Please input the alarm camera ID
Camera name maximum as 32 characters length
Exit the wizard.\nStay at AP Mode
Corrects the fisheye distortion due to wide angle lens, as a side-effect the angle of vision will be reduced.
Click OK to trigger the wireless sensor to code
If you hear sound out from camera like Dong,please tap Heard
If you hear sound out from camera like Di-Di-Di,please tap Go back and re-enter device password

1. Each Smartphone or Tablet needs its own App Account (e.g. in case you have two Smartphones, you will need two App Account).\n\n2. In case you forget your App Account password, please register a new Account.

Please make sure the following condition is fulfilled, otherwise the installation may fail:

1. The camera is already connected to the internet via LAN-Cable
2. Or the camera is already connected to the internet via WiFi. "Smart Scan" or "AirLink" was done successfully
3. If you add the camera to a second smartphone (or third), you need to register another App account - each Smartphone needs ist own App account
4. Find Camera ID on the back side of the camera
5. In case you've already added the camera on the first smarphone, you can find the Device ID there: My Camera -> Settings -> Camera Editor
Modifying the network may cause the camera to disconnect, camera would reboot automatically while network reconnected ,please confirm the action!
The camera has a password set. Please enter it!
Modify password successfully, please login again
Modify Successfully,the camera will reboot soon

Please adjust the sensitivity of motion detection according to your environment.

Level 1, least sensitive: triggers alarm only when the scenario in the sight field has changed heavily.
Level 5, most sensitive: any movement in the sight field triggers alarm.
Level 3 is by default.
Please be ware, motion detection treats all movements the same, it canâ€˜t distinguish between human, cars, trees, curtain or pets.
Current network is not available, please check your network settings
Network delay is large, it is recommended to switch network!
New password length must be no more than 9 character
New password length must be no more than 30 character
New password length must be no less than 6 character
No recording files found. Tap the screen to refresh.
No recording files found, tap the screen for a new search again
End of result list.You can try other options to find more recording files.
No Wifi List\nWe need the GPS service to get the wifi list, and click anywhere on the screen to open the GPS service.
Original password length must be no more than 10 characterr
Please play the video first and then open the record!
Network busy, Please try again later
Password consists exclusive of digits, 6 to 9 digits and can not begin with \'0\'
The password consists of 6-30 characters (0-9, a-z, A-Z); Special characters are not allowed. The password must not begin with \"0\".
Camera ID must be \"0\" at the beginning
Phone must be 6-15 characters in length
Verification code has been sent to
Turn ON/OFF the blue indicator LED.
Please connect your mobile phone to WIFI network first.
Target ID has been shut down
The password length must be between 6 and 30 digits
Please place mobile phone 20 to 30 centimeters away from camera, let camera face the Smart Scan Code.
Wait until you hear a Dong sound.

Please make sure the following condition is fulfilled, otherwise the installation may fail:
	1. The camera is powered on and beeps slightly: Di- Di-Diâ€¦If this is not the case, please reset the camera.
	2. The WiFi runs at 802.1 b/g/n (2.4GHz).
	3. You have internet access through the WiFi.
	4. Your smartphone is connected to the same WiFi, to which you want the camera connect to.
	5. You know the WiFi password, of course.
Your mobile device is not at the same LAN network with camera
Camera is unable to connect to WIFI
Switch the resolution will cause the recording to stop. Please restart it manually!
The operation will cause the recording to stop. Please restart it manually!

1. Each Smartphone or Tablet needs its own App Account (e.g. in case you have two Smartphones, you will need two App Account).\n\n2. In case you forget your App Account password, please register a new Account.
Place Smart Key facing to camera
Notice that you need to verify the password for your WIFI
Please insert Smart Key, and adjust the media sound to the highest level
If you forget your camera password, press the \"Reset\" of the camera with paper clip or something alike. It resets the camera password to default: \"123\".
Camera ID can not be \"0\" at the beginning
Your APP will not receive alarm information from the following camera
When enabled, RTSP username and password will be required to provide. The username is â€˜adminâ€™, the password is camera password
Start time must set before ending time
Searching can be connected to the camera
Please select a item to delete
could not send msg to yourself!
Session has expired, please login again
Camera will now reboot and switch to the WiFi. It may take 1 min. to be online again.
WiFi Verification successful!\nCamera will now switch to the WiFi. It may take 1 min. to be back online.
After blocking the camera, it will no longer receive the alarm information, you can unblock it in the alarm management
No SD card detected or network access failure, please try again
WiFi verification failed!\nWiFi SSID cannot be found.
The schedule plan should be within 24-hour in one day.
Please add new camera to start
Error, if there is no automatic recovery procedures, please restart manually!
This is the latest version(00.04.00.12),no need to update
The new version is available, do you want to update?
Updatingâ€¦ Please do not close this page.
The upgrade is done. The camera now is rebooting. It will come back to online in 1-2 minutes.
It contains technical diagnostic information of the HiKam Camera, this information helps us to diagnose the potential issues. It contains no personal information.
The User Information can not be empty!
3-20 symbols (letter, digit and . _ -), not starting with \"0\".\nExample: \"M.Baumer\" or \"Wolf1976\".
Username must be 3-21 characters in length
Visitor password must be digital combination and can not be \"0\" at the beginning
Visitor password length must be no more than 10 characterr
If this is not the case, please reset the camera.
WiFi verification failed!\nCould not obtain IP address from the router. Please check MAC filter and DHCP on the router.

WiFi verification failed!
WiFi signal too weak.
(swipe to scroll down...)Please contact our support service.us@hi-kam.com,if the camera is within 9-feet away from the router
We will response as soon as possbile.
WiFi verification timeout!.\nPlease have a try again
